name: Square Root (Gene-Z Games)
description:
Square Root

Game developed in a few hours for participation in the Global Game Jam 2023, where the objective is to direct the growth of the root of a tree so that it finds water.

Each time you find water, the process will repeat itself at a new, slightly more difficult level.

The score takes into account the amount of vitality you use to reach the goal.

Less effort, more score.
